name: UE5 Retro PSX Style Shooter (Prototype Testing - Monster AI)
name_original: UE5 Retro PSX Style Shooter (Prototype Testing - Monster AI)
description:
The Maze is going to be a retro PSX style, fast paced roguelike shooter using Unreal Engine 5, inspired by Quake II (PSX).

I am putting out this prototype in the hope that you provide me some feedback for the followings:

  • basic game mechanics (such as pick up items, weapon system, health system
  • monster ai

Controls:

  • Player Movement - WASD
  • Interaction - F
  • Fire - Left Mouse Button
  • Reload - R

I have a lot of fixing already in my mind, but I might miss something.

FYI, the map I used is for prototyping purposes only, it is part of the UnrealRetroShader pack.

Content were used from Retro3DGraphicsCollection, Sketchfab and freesound.org. A full credit list will be provided in any released beta version of the game.

Thank you!
